medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient exhibited signs of acromegaly with noticeable enlargement of hands, feet, nose, lower jaw, and tongue over the past 5 years. He also developed right faciobrachial paralysis and right-sided blindness at age 8, and had an epileptic seizure at age 15. The patient had a cardiac myxoma surgically removed at age 8. At age 24, he presented with a melanoma mass and had various tumors and hormonal abnormalities leading to endocrine assessment.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Right faciobrachial paralysis, right-sided blindness, cardiac myxoma removal at age 8, epileptic seizures at age 15, multiple middle cerebral artery aneurysms, bilateral testicular tumors.
medical_history.family_history: Relevant family history of Carney complex suggesting possible hereditary component, but neither parent carried the deletion.
